subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: ANAHEIM, Calif. — Torii Hunter was talking Sunday morning about his newfound patience at the plate, how he and Bobby Abreu, the Angels’ new patron saint of elevated pitch counts, would stand in the batting cages during spring training for 30 minutes or more without taking a swing. They would just talk.
